DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study assess mass balance recover carbon-14 ( 14C ) label ETC-1002 route rate excretion [ 14C ] -ETC-1002
DOC.brief_title: Single Radiolabeled Dose Study Investigate Absorption , Metabolism Excretion 14C-ETC-1002
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Volunteers BMI 1035 kg/m2 Hx CV , renal , hepatic , chronic respiratory GI disease Hx drug alcohol abuse smoke within 12 mo screen
